title: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped, braking frequently
caption: A small car drives slowly on a rainy night in a city street, with many other cars and pedestrians around.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

There are several traffic lights and stop signs visible, and some parked cars on the side of the road. The weather is rainy, and the lighting is dim due to the nighttime setting.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and braking frequently to maintain safety on the rainy city streets. The driver is being cautious due to the wet road conditions and the presence of other vehicles and pedestrians. The frequent braking events indicate that the driver is trying to avoid any sudden movements or collisions, especially in the challenging weather conditions.
